// Restricted // 
 
 
 
NO.CAS-8(4)/2010/DIV.I (Vehicle) 
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA 
BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY 
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION) 
A’ WING JANPATH BHAWAN 
JANPATH, NEW DELHI 
Dated :  08 /05/2012 
 
 
AVSEC CIRCULAR  NO. 10  / 2012 
 
 
Subject : Permission for Access of vehicle of Shri K. Rosaiah, Governor of Tamil  
              Nadu, without escort up to tarmac of all airports in  the country. 
 
 
                With reference to this Bureau AVSEC Circular No.08/2011 dated 01/02/2011, Shri 
K. Rosaiah, Governor of Tamil Nadu is hereby permitted to avail the access of his vehicle 
without escort upto tarmac during his departure / arrival  at all airports in the country, for 
a  period of one year w.e.f.  02/05/2012. 
 
 
This has the approval of Commissioner of Security(CA). 
 
 
      
 
 ( R.N.Dhoke, IPS )  
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
Distribution as per list attached/ overleaf. 
 
 
Copy to: 
 
 
1. 
MCA ( Shri Ashok Kumar, U/Secretary), R.G.Bhawan, New Delhi : w.r.t  
            MCA letter No.AV.13024/39/2007-SS dated 02/05/2012 
2. 
Prime Minster’s Office, South Block, New Delhi. 
3. 
Principal Resident Commissioner, Govt. of Tamil Nadu, Tamil Nadu  
            House, New Delhi.
